description: Revisions to North Stand approved as part of the Masterplan ref. 2003/0107 incorporating seating for 1306 persons and 16x1 bed flats on three floors. Provision for parking in the location approved under planning ref. 2003/0107. 2). Erection of 8-storey block to provide 46 flats (22x2 bed, 20x1 bed, 4x3 bed) behind the existing South Stand and fronting Buckingham Road / Coronation Gardens. Provision for parking on site and as part of amendment to the layout of Buckingham Road.
site_name: Matchroom Stadium, Leyton Orient Football Club
site_number: Matchroom Stadium, Leyton Orient Football Club
